    Private Yoga Class

    Personalized one-on-one yoga instruction tailored to your goals, level, and body. Perfect for beginners, injury recovery, or deepening your practice.

    üëá Scroll down and read more

    Private Yoga Class - Your Personal Practice

    Experience the transformative power of one-on-one yoga instruction with our certified teachers. Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner, recovering from injury, or looking to deepen your advanced practice, our private yoga classes offer personalized attention that group classes simply cannot provide.

    Why Choose Private Yoga?

    Personalized Attention

    Every body is unique, and your yoga practice should be too. In a private session, 100% of your teacher‚Äôs attention is focused on you, ensuring proper alignment, safe progressions, and techniques that work specifically for your body.

    Customized Practice

    • Beginner-Friendly - Learn fundamentals at your own pace
    • Injury Modification - Safe practices adapted to your needs
    • Advanced Techniques - Challenge yourself with personalized sequences
    • Specific Goals - Focus on what matters most to you

    Flexible Scheduling

    Book your session at a time that works for you, including:

    • Early morning sessions (6:00 AM start)
    • Lunch break classes
    • Evening wind-down sessions
    • Weekend intensive practices

    Your Private Session Experience

    Initial Consultation (10 minutes)

    Your session begins with a comprehensive discussion:

    • Health History - Any injuries or physical limitations
    • Experience Level - Current yoga background and practice
    • Goals & Intentions - What you want to achieve
    • Preferences - Favorite styles, music, pace

    Customized Practice (45 minutes)

    Based on your consultation, your teacher will guide you through:

    • Warm-up - Gentle movements to prepare your body
    • Breathwork - Pranayama techniques suited to your needs
    • Asana Practice - Poses specifically chosen for your goals
    • Modifications - Adjustments and variations for your body
    • Hands-on Assists - Safe, consensual adjustments when appropriate

    Integration & Closing (5 minutes)

    • Savasana - Deep relaxation tailored to your needs
    • Reflection - Discussion of key insights and techniques
    • Home Practice - Suggestions for continuing your journey

    Types of Private Sessions Available

    Beginner Foundations

    Perfect for: Complete newcomers to yoga Focus: Basic poses, breathing, yoga philosophy Benefits: Build confidence, learn proper alignment, establish routine

    Therapeutic Yoga

    Perfect for: Injury recovery, chronic pain, limited mobility Focus: Gentle movements, restorative poses, pain management Benefits: Improved mobility, pain relief, stress reduction

    Advanced Practice

    Perfect for: Experienced practitioners seeking challenge Focus: Advanced poses, inversions, arm balances, pranayama Benefits: Skill development, strength building, deeper understanding

    Prenatal Yoga

    Perfect for: Expecting mothers (all trimesters) Focus: Safe poses for pregnancy, birth preparation, relaxation Benefits: Reduced discomfort, birth preparation, emotional support

    Meditation & Breathwork

    Perfect for: Stress relief, mindfulness development Focus: Meditation techniques, advanced pranayama, relaxation Benefits: Mental clarity, emotional balance, stress management

    Flow Development

    Perfect for: Creating smooth, flowing sequences Focus: Vinyasa transitions, rhythm, creative sequencing Benefits: Improved coordination, grace, artistic expression

    Meet Your Teachers

    Certified Expertise

    All our private session teachers are:

    • 200+ Hour Certified - Comprehensive yoga teacher training
    • Continued Education - Regular workshops and advanced training
    • Specialized Skills - Additional certifications in various modalities
    • Years of Experience - Extensive teaching background

    Teaching Specialties

    • Trauma-Informed Yoga - Safe space for healing
    • Anatomy & Alignment - Scientific approach to poses
    • Meditation & Mindfulness - Mental wellness focus
    • Therapeutic Applications - Yoga for specific conditions
    • Advanced Techniques - Challenging practices for growth

    What‚Äôs Included

    Professional Instruction

    • Certified, experienced yoga teacher
    • Personalized sequence design
    • Real-time adjustments and modifications
    • Home practice recommendations

    Premium Studio Space

    • Climate-controlled environment
    • High-quality props and equipment
    • Peaceful, distraction-free setting
    • Sound system for meditation music

    All Equipment Provided

    • Premium yoga mats
    • Blocks, straps, and bolsters
    • Blankets for relaxation
    • Essential oil aromatherapy

    Who Benefits from Private Yoga?

    Complete Beginners

    • Learn proper form from the start
    • Build confidence before joining group classes
    • Ask questions without feeling rushed
    • Progress at your own comfortable pace

    Injury Recovery

    • Work safely around limitations
    • Focus on therapeutic movements
    • Rebuild strength and flexibility gradually
    • Coordinate with medical treatment plans

    Busy Professionals

    • Flexible scheduling around work demands
    • Efficient, focused practice sessions
    • Stress relief tailored to your lifestyle
    • Quick energy boosts or relaxation

    Advanced Practitioners

    • Break through practice plateaus
    • Learn challenging new poses safely
    • Refine technique and alignment
    • Explore advanced breathing practices

    Special Populations

    • Prenatal and postnatal women
    • Seniors seeking gentle movement
    • Athletes wanting yoga cross-training
    • Anyone with specific physical needs

    Booking Your Private Session

    Easy Scheduling

    • Online Booking - Reserve your preferred time slot
    • WhatsApp - Quick communication with our team
    • Phone - Direct contact for special requests
    • Walk-in - Subject to teacher availability

    Advance Notice

    • 24 hours preferred - Ensures teacher availability
    • Same-day possible - Based on schedule openings
    • Recurring sessions - Weekly or monthly regulars welcome

    Cancellation Policy

    • 12 hours notice - Full refund or reschedule
    • Less than 12 hours - 50% charge applies
    • No-show - Full session charge
    • Weather policy - Flexible rescheduling for safety
